description:
Chiharu studies nursing at the Yohokama City University. http://anidb.net/ch94422 [Azusagawa Sakuta] meets her on a group date he was asked to attend by his friend from the university, http://anidb.net/ch149516 [Fukuyama Takumi].
As it turns out she is friends with http://anidb.net/ch98526 [Kamisato Saki], a sworn enemy of Sakuta, who also studies nursing at the same university.
name: Chiharu
